definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: Kt, [[[חחר]]] Qr, denominat. from [[חחחרה]] = sound a clarion—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מַחְחְח֠רִים]] (Qr [[מַחְחְרִים]] as Hiph. v. Kö:ii, 252) 1Ch 15:24 + 3 t. + 2Ch 5:12 Baer, (van d. H [[מחחררים]]); sound with clarions ´[[מח]] [[בחחחרות]] 1Ch 15:24, 2Ch 5:12, 2Ch 13:14; abs. sounded (sounding) 2Ch 7:6, 2Ch 29:28, cf. [[חחחרה]] ad fin. (Kt in all to be pronounced (prob.) [[מְחַחְחְרִים]]).
